title: 材质有问题
author: 子郷菌
txt_content:
border=0 />

请问那些紫色和火怎么去掉

replies.author: ka529461
replies.txt_content: 详细方法请点击这里http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... F%C7%E5%D0%DE%B8%B4。引用于well

replies.author: ka529461
replies.txt_content: 这个是高清材质哦，要用高清修复的，只要是64X和64X以上的都是高清材质，高清修复这里去http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... F%C7%E5%D0%DE%B8%B4

replies.author: ka529461
replies.txt_content: 要是上面那个用不到，下载这个吧。http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... hlight=%B8%DF%C7%E5
